answers.answer: I do. Right now the best I have is check your blood sugar a lot more often. My endo told me I need to check 8-12 times a day now and as insulin resistance goes up in the next trimesters we'll discuss how much I'll need to then. I'm constantly having to snack for low blood sugar. Follow up with a good protein to keep it up longer. Good luck, momma!

question: Hi, this is my first baby and I'm kinda worried because of my diabetes. Does anyone have any advice?
title: anyone with type one diabetes?
